physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient presented with muscle weakness and abnormal sensations in both legs, hyporeflexia in 4 limbs, autonomic failure (impotence, urinary and fecal incontinence, edema in lower limbs).
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Condition gradually improved after orthotopic liver transplantation, and the patient started to work again 10 months post-transplant.
